description:
This course is designed to enable learners to gain an understanding of the essential business principles on starting a successful business.
This course will run for a total of 4 weeks. Learners are expected to complete the lessons and participate in the activities.
At the end of week 4, certificate will be issued to the learners who managed to complete all the lessons and activities.
Please refer to detail description for more info on the course.

                                            Syllabus
                        In week 1, learners will be introduced to the basic concept surrounding business, generating business ideas and profits.
In week 2,Â we will be looking at the idea of small business, entrepreneurship, methods of starting business and their pros and cons.
In week 3, our main focus would be on understanding ways to own a business.
In week 4, we will be going through the basic management process and how to properly manage a business.
title: Guide to Starting a Successful Business
